patsy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who is easily tricked or deceived, especially so that they take the blame for someone elseâ€™s crime
patsy.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a character in the humorous British television programme Absolutely Fabulous, played by the actress Joanna Lumley. Patsy Stone is an upper class woman and works for a fashion magazine but spends most of her time drinking alcohol, taking drugs, and shopping in expensive clothes shops.
